events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible due to this error.
System classified the issue under the Refund cluster based on the customer's mention of refund and wrong product.
Customer support agent John Smith has been assigned to the refund request case for this order.
Hello, this is John from customer service. I’m sorry to hear about the mistake with your order. I’m here to help you get a refund processed quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received to help us verify and process the refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo showing that the product I received is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method. Please allow 5-7 business days for the amount to be credited.
That sounds good, thank you for resolving this quickly. I appreciate your assistance with the refund.
The refund process has been completed on our end. If you have further questions, please let us know and we’ll be happy to help.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund. Please reach out if there is any issue or additional support needed.
Since the refund was successful and no further response was received, this case will be closed now. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email address. Please let us know how we did by completing it.
